paper.title: Self-configuring Cost-Sensitive Hierarchical Clustering with Recourse
paper.abstract: We revisit algorithm selection for declarative programming solvers. We introduce two main ideas to improve cost-sensitive hierarchical clustering: First, to augment the portfolio builder with a self-configuration component. And second, we propose that the algorithm selector assesses the confidence level of its own prediction, so that a more defensive recourse action can be used to overturn the original recommendation.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要讨论的是算法选择和成本敏感的层次聚类技术，虽然聚类技术可以应用于金融领域，但论文中并未明确指出或讨论其在衍生品定价、金融风险管理或投资组合管理等特定金融领域的应用。
